text: Harlem Globetrotters is a Saturday morning cartoon produced by Hanna-Barbera and CBS Productions. It features animated versions of players from the basketball team of the same name. == Other websites == * * * Harlem Globetrotters according to Wingnut * Gold Key Hanna-Barbera Harlem Globetrotters comic book gallery * CBS Television Distribution Syndication Bible - The Harlem Globetrotters Category:1970 television series debuts Category:1972 television series endings Category:1970s American television series endings
title: Harlem Globetrotters (TV series)
